title: Was Volkswagen Beetle and her knees broken between two trucks?
subtitle: Beep, beep, beep, beep, beep, beep, beep, beep, beep, beep, beep, beep, beep, beep, beep, beep, beep, beep, beep, beep, beep, beep, beep, beep, beep, beep, beep, beep, beep, beep. "Smashing Strike"
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: Two large trucks that had been hit face-to-face after weeks were withdrawn, revealing that the Volkswagen Betel car and its occupants had been crushed between them.
